message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,450,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,350,000
Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing. However, the value of this product is quite significant, and I believe my initial offer was fair. I can adjust slightly to $1,400,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000
